choices: Change other people as a girl
Change other people as a boy
Have some fun with your new female body
1.content:
You wake up one morning, and sit up in bed... scratching your head, you feel a strange movement from your hair... but you ignore it and continue towards the bathroom.

On the way the the bathroom, you notice that you aren't walking the same way, because there is some sort of shift in balance... but you once again ignore it.

So, once you are in the bathroom, you grab your toothbrush, and notice that your hand doesn't look like it should be, and now that you think about it, your body doesn't either. You then look in the mirror, and see something unexpected... A girl! Shocked, you grab your cheeks, and notice that you transform to normal. Looking strangely at your reflection, you touch your face again, and see that you change again!

Now that you see this... What will you do now?
1.title: A strange morning...

11.content:
You grab some of your clothes, and find that they change to suit a female body. While you think of this conveinience, you put on these new clothes, and head downstairs.

You wonder if you should go into the kitchen to eat some breakfast, because some of your family members may be in there. Will you risk it, or just go out for breakfast at the local mall? Or maybe even skip breakfast altogether?
11.title: Change other people as a girl

111.content: So you head to the kitchen, but is there anyone there?
111.title: Kitchen

choices: Your friend's house to show off your new power
Your girlfriend's house to have some fun
114.content: You decided that you aren't really all that hungry, and you go to...
114.title: Skip breakfast

choices: Your sister changes into a boy
You accidently change yourself into a girl while cleaning yourself
12.content:
You change yourself back and get ready for a new day, while being careful not to touch yourself with your hands, of course.

You now decide that you should have some breakfast. You get out a glass of orange juice and spill some of it on your hands. While cleaning it up, your bratty sister grabs the glass and drinks it happily.
12.title: Change other people as a boy

choices: Meet your friends and see if they like the change
Just stay home and wait for that night
13.content:
You decide that maybe you should see what your female body can do that you couldn't do as a guy...

But what do you start with?
13.title: Have some fun with your new female body

info.brief_description: A boy gains the midas touch, but he changes their gender...
info.description:
You wake up one morning feeling quite weird... after someobservations.... you realize... You have become a girl! When you see this, you slap your face with both hands, and surprisingly, change back! This puzzles you, and you decide that your touch can change people's genders!

Please... no sexual references
